00015 /// \file
00016 /// Provides the fold instructions
00017 
00018 #include <machine.hpp>
00019 #include <instructions.hpp>
00020 
00021 class FoldInstructions {
00022     
00023     protected:
00024         
00025         static Index export_index;
00026         static Data * result;
00027         static Address mold;
00028         static Address fuse;
00029         
00030     public:
00031         
00032         static Data dummy_result;
00033         
00034         static void fold_hood(Machine & machine, Data & result) {
00035             Index export_index = machine.nextInt8();
00036             Data export_value = machine.stack.pop();
00037             result = machine.stack.pop().copy();
00038             Address fuse = machine.stack.popAddress();
00039             
00040             FoldInstructions::export_index = export_index;
00041             FoldInstructions::result = &result;
00042             FoldInstructions::fuse = fuse;
00043             
00044             machine.environment.push(result);
00045             machine.environment.push(export_value);
00046             machine.call(fuse,fold_hood_first);
00047         }
00048         
00049         static void fold_hood_first(Machine & machine) {
00050             *result = machine.stack.pop().copy();
00051             
00052             Data export_value = machine.environment.pop();
00053             machine.environment.pop();
00054             
00055             machine.thisMachine().imports[export_index] = export_value;
00056             
00057             machine.current_neighbour = machine.hood.begin();
00058             machine.environment.push(*result);
00059             machine.environment.push(machine.current_neighbour->imports[export_index]);
00060             machine.call(fuse,fold_hood_step);
00061         }
00062         
00063         static void fold_hood_step(Machine & machine) {
00064             machine.environment.pop(2);
00065             *result = machine.stack.pop().copy();
00066             if (++machine.current_neighbour != machine.hood.end()){
00067                 machine.environment.push(*result);
00068                 machine.environment.push(machine.current_neighbour->imports[export_index]);
00069                 machine.call(fuse,fold_hood_step);
00070             } else {
00071                 machine.stack.push(*result);
00072             }
00073         }
00074         
00075         static void fold_hood_plus(Machine & machine, Data & result) {
00076             
00077             Index export_index = machine.nextInt8();
00078             Data export_value = machine.stack.pop();
00079             Address mold = machine.stack.popAddress();
00080             Address fuse = machine.stack.popAddress();
00081             
00082             FoldInstructions::export_index = export_index;
00083             FoldInstructions::result = &result;
00084             FoldInstructions::mold = mold;
00085             FoldInstructions::fuse = fuse;
00086             
00087             machine.environment.push(export_value);
00088             machine.call(mold,fold_hood_plus_first_mold);
00089         }
00090         
00091         static void fold_hood_plus_first_mold(Machine & machine) {
00092             
00093             *result = machine.stack.pop().copy();
00094             
00095             Data export_value = machine.environment.pop();
00096             
00097             machine.thisMachine().imports[export_index] = export_value;
00098             
00099             machine.current_neighbour = machine.hood.begin();
00100             machine.environment.push(machine.current_neighbour->imports[export_index]);
00101             machine.call(mold,fold_hood_plus_step_mold);
00102         }
00103         
00104         static void fold_hood_plus_step_mold(Machine & machine){
00105             machine.environment.pop(1);
00106             Data import = machine.stack.pop();
00107             machine.environment.push(*result);
00108             machine.environment.push(import);
00109             machine.call(fuse,fold_hood_plus_step_fuse);
00110         }
00111         
00112         static void fold_hood_plus_step_fuse(Machine & machine){
00113             machine.environment.pop(2);
00114             *result = machine.stack.pop().copy();
00115             if (++machine.current_neighbour != machine.hood.end()){
00116                 machine.environment.push(machine.current_neighbour->imports[export_index]);
00117                 machine.call(mold,fold_hood_plus_step_mold);
00118             } else {
00119                 machine.stack.push(*result);
00120             }
00121         }
00122         
00123 };
00124 
00125 Index   FoldInstructions::export_index;
00126 Data *  FoldInstructions::result;
00127 Address FoldInstructions::mold;
00128 Address FoldInstructions::fuse;
00129 Data    FoldInstructions::dummy_result;
00130 
00131 namespace Instructions {
00132     
00133     void FOLD_HOOD(Machine & machine){
00134         FoldInstructions::fold_hood(machine,FoldInstructions::dummy_result);
00135     }
00136     
00137     void VFOLD_HOOD(Machine & machine){
00138         Data & result = machine.globals[machine.nextInt8()];
00139         FoldInstructions::fold_hood(machine,result);
00140     }
00141     
00142     void FOLD_HOOD_PLUS(Machine & machine){
00143         FoldInstructions::fold_hood_plus(machine,FoldInstructions::dummy_result);
00144     }
00145     
00146     void VFOLD_HOOD_PLUS(Machine & machine){
00147         Data & result = machine.globals[machine.nextInt8()];
00148         FoldInstructions::fold_hood_plus(machine,result);
00149     }
00150     
00151 }
